version_description:
• Finding your ideal hotel just got even easier: You can now filter by lodging type, hotel amenities, room features and much more to find the hotel that fits you best!
• Quick access to member area: We've implemented a new feature that makes it possible to easily log in to your account through the app homepage.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements for an enhanced experience.

• Finding your ideal hotel just got even easier: You can now filter by lodging type, hotel amenities, room features and much more to find the hotel that fits you best!
• Quick access to member area: We've implemented a new feature that makes it possible to easily log in to your account through the app homepage.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements for an enhanced experience.

Bugfixes and stability improvements

• UI polishing: We gave our app a facelift that comes with a whole new look and feel! A fresh coat of paint and new set of icons make for a cleaner design and an improved ease of use.
• Bugfixes and stability improvements

• It's no one's business where you’re going next! On popular demand, we now offer a manual option to clear your search history.
• Found a hotel you love? Tap our new hip heart icon to save it for later. Bookmarking has never been simpler.

● 3D Touch offers neat little shortcuts for iPhone 6s and 6s Plus, iPhone 7 and 7 Plus users. Quickly jump into your bookmarks, browse through the map view or find hotels near you tonight by pressing on the trivago home screen logo.
● Bugfixes and stability improvements.

● 3D Touch offers neat little shortcuts for iPhone 6s and 6s Plus, iPhone 7 and 7 Plus users. Quickly jump into your bookmarks, browse through the map view or find hotels near you tonight by pressing on the trivago home screen logo.
● Bugfixes and stability improvements.

Thanks for using the trivago app. We always take our users' reviews into consideration as we make improvements, so be sure to let us know what you think. From now on, you can expect fixed monthly releases based on what we learn from you. Just go to your settings and enable automatic updates.

• Looking for all the hotels along the coastline? You can now zoom, drag, pinch (we’ve heard "flick" is the new thing to say?) within any area of the map to receive a live preview of active hotels in a city, region, country, or even… the world! Less time typing, more time doing cool stuff (like eating French toast).
• Bug fixes and performance improvements for an enhanced experience.

Hello world! Time for another update about our sweet app:
• We've improved the way to manage your data privacy settings.
• We've optimized the login process.

Hello world! Time for another update about our sweet app:
• We've optimized the way review scores are displayed.
• An inconsistency between how dates appeared in the calendar and the date picker was fixed.

Hello world! Time for another update about our sweet app:

• We've decluttered the map so you can get a better overview of the hotels you've searched for.
• It's now easier to log in with the addition of social media log in options!

Hello world! Here are the latest improvements we've made to our app:
• Images now load faster than ever, making it easier for you to browse photos.
• Don't you hate it when you accidentally trigger a search without a destination? Well, worry no more! We've fixed that bug so your search starts only when you want it to.

Greetings traveler! Here's an update on some things we've been tinkering with:
•Your room and date selection will be displayed at the top of the gallery when you're viewing in full-screen mode
•Changes to data privacy settings can be made on all platforms
•You now have the option to delete your search history

Greetings traveler! trivago here. We have a few updates to share with you!

•Added a label for alternative accommodations, so you can spot them easily
•Bookmarked searches now run without any hiccups
•The correct currency is shown

Hello world! Here are the latest improvements we've made to our app:
• We noticed that filtering sometimes caused the app to crash, so of course we went back and fixed things right up!
• We addressed a bug in our design that caused lines to get misplaced in certain views.

Greetings traveler! trivago here, we've managed to fix the following bugs:
• Fixed an issue where carousel in map is not shown
• Fixed an issue with changing the distance unit in Arabic locales
• Fixed an issue where share button is disabled after reconnecting

• Fixed an issue with changing the distance unit in Arabic locales
• Fixed an issue where share button is disabled after reconnecting

• You can now see the date of stay for hotel reviews
• Improved the wording of our sorting options

Fixed a bug, where the currency symbol is not displayed in RTL languages

“Congratulations! It’s a brand-new app!”

Dear travelers,

We’re overjoyed to announce the arrival of the latest addition to the trivago family: our brand-new iOS app!
Our second child is more functional (uses less data, runs faster, is more stable) and, let’s face it, more beautiful. Sure, all parents think their kids are the cutest, but would you look at this clean and modern (inter)face? Adorable.
Keep an eye on this one, folks — it’s going places.

“Congratulations! It’s a brand-new app!”

Dear travelers,

We’re overjoyed to announce the arrival of the latest addition to the trivago family: our brand-new iOS app!
Our second child is more functional (uses less data, runs faster, is more stable) and, let’s face it, more beautiful. Sure, all parents think their kids are the cutest, but would you look at this clean and modern (inter)face? Adorable.
Keep an eye on this one, folks — it’s going places.

Hello world! Ever eager to improve your app experience, we’ve made some changes. Not only can you now view a summary of your travels via the toolbar but those in multilingual countries can also enjoy smarter default language settings which combine your language preferences with your location. Also, iPad/iOS 12 users may notice that the layout fits more snugly in their screens. That’s all for now folks! Tune in next time for more!

Hello world! Ever eager to improve your app experience, we’ve made some changes. Not only can you now view a summary of your travels via the toolbar but those in multilingual countries can also enjoy smarter default language settings which combine your language preferences with your location. Also, iPad/iOS 12 users may notice that the layout fits more snugly in their screens. That’s all for now folks! Tune in next time for more!

Heads up! We’ve got some piping hot updates heading your way! For instance— now when you open the map, the map will zoom in on your current location. We’ve also improved your viewing experience by making sure that search results fit your device’s screen specifically. And let’s not forget the work we’ve done with our images: you can now enjoy higher resolution photos, faster.

Heads up! We’ve got some piping hot updates heading your way! For instance— now when you open the map, the map will zoom in on your current location. We’ve also improved your viewing experience by making sure that search results fit your device’s screen specifically. And let’s not forget the work we’ve done with our images: you can now enjoy higher resolution photos, faster.

Good morning App Store! Here's your bi-weekly report from trivago's app team. 1. Users can now see how far a selected accommodation is from various popular sites, not the other way around. 2. How currency is displayed on platforms for languages that read right-to-left has been fixed. And last but not least: 3. we've got a nifty new loading animation that's smooth like jazz and better synced with the text.

Good morning App Store! Here's your bi-weekly report from trivago's app team. 1. Users can now see how far a selected accommodation is from various popular sites, not the other way around. 2. How currency is displayed on platforms for languages that read right-to-left has been fixed. And last but not least: 3. we've got a nifty new loading animation that's smooth like jazz and better synced with the text.

We're back and we're better, faster, and stronger. Have you ever noticed that some info got cut off when your results loaded or that data wasn't being used moderately enough? Ever have the app crash when you swiped through the gallery? Well no more! We've fixed all that so you can look for your ideal accommodation without getting distracted by bugs or slowed down by data limits.

We're back and we're better, faster, and stronger. Have you ever noticed that some info got cut off when your results loaded or that data wasn't being used moderately enough? Ever have the app crash when you swiped through the gallery? Well no more! We've fixed all that so you can look for your ideal accommodation without getting distracted by bugs or slowed down by data limits.

Greetings traveler! trivago here, positively tickled to be the bearer of good news! We've managed to fix that pesky bug that kept cutting off the filter tags, as well as the not-so-clear error message that popped up when people tried to find a room for dates that have passed. We've also prettied things up around the search area. We hope you like it!

Hey there! Here's what new with our app:
• Selections you make regarding price and accommodation location (EX: distance from a specific site) now count as applied filters. This will be reflected in the filter counter.
• We noticed that irrelevant deals sometimes make their way into result lists after filters have been applied. But don't you worry! We've fixed that bug.

Hey there! Here's what new with our app:
• Selections you make regarding price and accommodation location (EX: distance from a specific site) now count as applied filters. This will be reflected in the filter counter.
• We noticed that irrelevant deals sometimes make their way into result lists after filters have been applied. But don't you worry! We've fixed that bug.
